title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Arrest – Nichole Maks

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Request for Body Cam Footage of Arrest – Nichole Maks
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: July 1, 2023
Location: 600 block of Clark Street, Daytona Beach, FL
Suspect: Nichole Maks, 37
Incident Summary:
Nichole Maks was arrested for the murder of her 79-year-old roommate, Michael Cerasoli. Authorities responded to a fire at the residence, where Cerasoli was found deceased with blunt force trauma and multiple stab wounds. Maks was later located at a restaurant in Holly Hill, where she was found with blood on her clothing and in possession of a knife and hammer. During her post-Miranda interview, she attempted to destroy potential evidence by pouring Diet Mountain Dew on herself. She was charged with second-degree murder, resisting arrest with violence, arson, and tampering with physical evidence.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who:

First made contact with Nichole Maks.
Took her into custody at the restaurant in Holly Hill.
Transported her to the station and recorded her post-Miranda interview.
Were involved in securing evidence and handling the tampering incident.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Arrest – Major George Drafts

communications.subject: South Carolina Public Records Law Request: Request for Body Cam Footage of Arrest – Major George Drafts
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the South Carolina Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:
ocation: Myrtle Beach, SC
Suspect: Major George Drafts
Incident Summary:
A major in the Columbia Police Department (CPD) was arrested Thursday night.
Columbia Police confirmed that Major George Drafts was arrested and charged with driving under the influence and transporting in a vehicle with a broken seal by Myrtle Beach police officers.
Per CPD protocol, Drafts has been suspended without pay pending an internal investigation.
According to police, Drafts was released on bond early Friday morning.

I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who:
Conducted the traffic stop and field sobriety tests.
Arrested and transported Major George Drafts.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 15 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Harun
